General.Name: Scomi Energy Services Bhd
General.Description: Scomi Energy Services Bhd, an investment holding company, engages in the provision of marine logistics solutions to oil and gas industries in Malaysia, Russia, West Africa, the Middle East, Nigeria, Pakistan, Oman, Indonesia, India, and internationally. The company engages in the provision of oilfield equipment, and supplies and services, as well as renting equipment and support services to the oil and gas industry. It also undertakes issuance of private debt securities; and sells a range of specialized chemicals. The company was formerly known as Scomi Marine Bhd. and changed its name to Scomi Energy Services Bhd in February 2013. Scomi Energy Services Bhd was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
